NK103(pe)018:1: // ra t+na m+aa le n+aa ma bi ha ra ti sma ////
NK103(pe)018:2: rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs /
NK103(pe)018:6: mi rtog la re ba skong ba'i rin po che'i
NK103(pe)018:7: dang po nas mthar phyin pa'i bar gyi rim pa
NK103(pe)018:8: phreng ba ma nor bar ston pa zhes bya ba
NK103(pe)018:9: // rang 'od thugs dam gyi lhar rang snang ba'i
NK103(pe)018:10: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la thun mong khyad par
NK103(pe)018:12: rang gi rgyud rgyu rkyen gyis ma bcos pa'i chos nyid ni bcom ldan 'das yin te //
NK103(pe)018:13: yul du grub pa min pa'i blos brtag par dka'
NK103(pe)018:14: zhing nges byed kyi rkyen dang bral bas ma rtogs
NK103(pe)018:15: yang // chos nyid rang snang kha de bla ma dam pas gdams ngag gi dus re shig na //
NK103(pe)018:16: sangs rgyas sku gsum du ro gcig par bdag phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)018:17: ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du ye nas gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)018:18: rgyu ma rig pa gnyis dang rkyen nyon mongs pa
NK103(pe)018:19: lnga dang las gsum kyis khams gsum snod bcud du
NK103(pe)018:20: 'phangs te // yang na gzhi'i nyes pa sdug zhen
NK103(pe)018:21: drug gi bsngal 1gsum sogs dang theg brgyad rtsol bas
NK103(pe)018:23: ga dang lung brgyud pa'i gdams pas gsal bar mdzad
NK103(pe)018:25: go rim ma nor ba'i 'brel khapa dang bral bas
NK103(pe)018:26: gnas lugs mngon sum du grub ngapa yi //
NK103(pe)018:27: chu bo dang bral bar gyur pa de'i phyir rim
NK103(pe)018:28: pa ka pa ma 'khrugs pa bzhag 0 par bya'o
NK103(pe)018:29: // de 0yis rang rang gi rgyud la don nges par gsal nas //
NK103(pe)018:30: 'khrul pa rang sar grol te rtsol med bde chen gyi srog dang ldan pa yin no //
NK103(pe)018:31: rim pa ji ltar zhe na dang po rang rang gi shes rab kyi rgyud thos pas bkrol nas /
NK103(pe)018:32: rig pa'i rtsal sbyang ste bar du gcod pa'i bdud brtag cing //
NK103(pe)018:33: bdud de nyid rang sar grol ba'i thabs bstan nas //
NK103(pe)018:34: ngang rtogs pa'i de la 'dris shing goms pas mthar phyin par bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:35: skabs re shig du gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu yis //
NK103(pe)018:36: don gyi gzhung chen lnga'i khog dbub par byas la //
NK103(pe)018:37: bshad thabs dang 'dren pa'i tshig bcu pa tshan gnyis
NK103(pe)018:38: dang don gyi 'grel pa lnga yis rgyud bshad pa
NK103(pe)018:39: gang zag blo sbram gyi shes pa'i rgyud thos pas
NK103(pe)018:40: dgrol bar bya ba ni gzhan rgyan du bshad pa
NK103(pe)018:42: rig pa'i rtsal sbyang pa la yan lag grangs gsum //
NK103(pe)018:43: ming blo gros dri ba'i yul slob dpon dang gdams pa gtad pa'i rten slob ma dang /
NK103(pe)018:44: man ngag bstan pa'i rim pa'o //
NK103(pe)018:45: thun mong du dbang bskur thob pa dang khyad par
NK103(pe)018:46: rig pa rtsal gyis thob pa'i dbang gi chu bo
NK103(pe)018:47: rdzogs shing // thabs chen bya bral mkha' khyab dang
NK103(pe)018:48: lung gsum gyi tshig gi brgyud pa bar ma chad
NK103(pe)018:49: pas rgyud kyi chu bo can //
NK103(pe)018:50: brda bral rang grol ba'i man ngag gi brgyud pas bar ma chad pas chu bo rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)018:51: chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum bzhi yis
NK103(pe)018:52: mngon yum du grub pas thag chod de yid ches
NK103(pe)018:54: gong na med pas bla ma re ba bskong bas
NK103(pe)018:55: rin chen srog bde chen rtogs pa'i gi gzungs so
NK103(pe)018:56: // dbang thob kapa sa non khapa theg pa kun la gamkhas //
NK103(pe)018:57: don nges par rtogs ngathugs rje cache zhing brtson par chaston //
NK103(pe)018:58: chos ston mkhas jathugs rgyud 'jam nyanor rdzas la sred pa tachung //
NK103(pe)018:59: nges don snying po 'ba' zhig gi sgra gcig pu la dga' ba thayis //
NK103(pe)018:60: gsang sngags kyi ka ston par gnang zhing nyon mongs
NK103(pe)018:61: dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen kha thub gol gapa dang
NK103(pe)018:63: lta ba gzhan gyis log par mi 'phrogs man ngag rdzogs capar gnang zhing dus myur chadu ston //
NK103(pe)018:64: tshig dang don rtogs japa skyen dam nyatshig mi nyams dad tapa mi ldog /
NK103(pe)018:65: de tha yi rjes su bu yang nges pa'i don la rton pa'i dgos pa yod pa'o //
NK103(pe)018:66: slob bu yis yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i
NK103(pe)018:67: bla ma de la rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi'i 'du
NK103(pe)018:69: bla ma de yis man ngag gtad pa'i rten slob ma'i yon tan dag kyang //
NK103(pe)018:70: snod kyi yon tan dang ldan la bla ma la snying brtse zhing //
NK103(pe)018:71: mched grogs la sems gdungs shing dam tshig la rtag tu gnas //
NK103(pe)018:72: yid mi 'gyur bar brtan zhing blo shes rab gsal
NK103(pe)018:73: te shes rab gsum sbyong ba la bsnyugs su ring
NK103(pe)018:74: // gzhi dad pa dang grogs brtson 'grus dang brtse gdung dam tshig gsum dang rab tu ldan pas //
NK103(pe)018:75: bla ma rang gi srog ltar du gces par 'dzin
NK103(pe)018:76: cing gdams ngag gter ltar du mi spel bar 'chang
NK103(pe)018:77: ba // mdo sde dang rgyud sde dag las rab tu basngagasa pa'i yon tan dang ldan la //
NK103(pe)018:78: mdo rgyud de dag las gsungs pa yi skyon dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i rigs can gyi slob bu1 //
NK103(pe)018:79: pha 3bla ma yis de la 2rgyal 4ba'i gdung sob pa'i sras su dgongs //
NK103(pe)018:80: yang dag pa'i don grub pa'i rten yin pas thugs kyis nges par gzung la //
NK103(pe)018:81: phral gyi snod skyon bcos skyo dub med pa'i zhes drang shing zhar gyis yon tan rnams bslab //
NK103(pe)018:82: gong gi snod ldan gyi yan lag dam par de
NK103(pe)018:83: dag tshang ba ni thugs sras kyi slob ma'i mchog
NK103(pe)018:84: yin no // man ngag gi rim pa ni slob dpon de dag phan tshun du rnyed nas //
NK103(pe)018:85: lus ngag gi spyod pa nor rdzas dang bcas pa yis //
NK103(pe)018:86: tshul lam thabs ci nas kyang bla ma mnyes par byas shing //
NK103(pe)018:87: dper na mgo bo'i skra la me 'bar ba gsad pa bas kyang //
NK103(pe)018:88: rings pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi the tshom rnams gcad do //
NK103(pe)018:89: bla mas dus dang po dbang gi sngon 'gro gnas dben pa'i sar //
NK103(pe)018:90: zhag lnga tshan gnyis dang gcig tu slob mas 'byor tshad kyis bsag cing //
NK103(pe)018:91: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad cing bsrung //
NK103(pe)018:92: sku +aahgasunga h'u thugs sarba thams cad ta th+aa ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa /
NK103(pe)018:93: k+aa ya sku w+aaka gsung tsit+ta thugs b+ho d+hi byang
NK103(pe)018:94: chub tsit+ta sems ma h+aa chen po su ka bde
NK103(pe)018:95: ba h'u rig pa a ma skyes pa //
NK103(pe)018:96: rang gi lus rnam pa sgyu ma lhun grub las //
NK103(pe)018:97: de'i gzugs brnyan kun tu bzang po rdo rje dril bu can ni 0don 0gyi 0rtags //
NK103(pe)018:98: h'u rig pa ye shes badz+ra rdo rje p+aa ni
NK103(pe)018:99: lag na ma h+aa chen po yag k+sha gnod sbyin
NK103(pe)018:100: ni la b+ha ra gos sngon can d+ha ra zung
NK103(pe)018:101: zhig da ha ni chom zhig /
NK103(pe)018:102: ye shes su h'u phata sgrol cig /
NK103(pe)018:103: kun bzang gi mdun du g.yas pa rang rtags rdo
NK103(pe)018:104: rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin chos nyid kyi
NK103(pe)018:105: ngang las shar ba'i bsgo ba'i bka' nyan pa'i tshul
NK103(pe)018:106: du bsam mo // ye shes lnga ldan badz+ra rdo
NK103(pe)018:107: rje yak+sha gnod sbyin kro d+ha khro bo dz+wa la
NK103(pe)018:108: 'bar ba ha la rgyob cig ha la h'u phata
NK103(pe)018:109: du bsam mo // sus la sgrol / sprul pa'i
NK103(pe)018:110: khro chung 'phros shing me 'od 'bar bas bgegs bskrad
NK103(pe)018:111: du bsam mo // sus la sgrol / par bya'o
NK103(pe)018:112: // badz+ra tsakra rak+sha rak+sha mu la tsu le rak+sha
NK103(pe)018:114: rang gi lus lus rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam pa las //
NK103(pe)018:115: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyis phyogs bcur bar gcod rnams gcod cing sgrol //
NK103(pe)018:116: rang dbus kyi lte bar gnas pas bar du chod pa thams cad bral te //
NK103(pe)018:117: rig pa sngags ting nge'i srog dang dbang klong drang bcas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:118: de ltar zhag bcu gcig byas nas thun zhag gsum gyi bar dag la /
NK103(pe)018:119: slob ma'i snod kyi skyon yon rnams bshad la man ngag bstan pa ni /
NK103(pe)018:120: nang nub du myur du 'chi ba mi rtag pa
NK103(pe)018:121: bsam zhing las dge sdig kyi bag chags bsags pa
NK103(pe)018:122: rnams bgrang ste / mi bslu bar nges par blo
NK103(pe)018:123: phrug su ci bzhag da lta rang dros kyis chod
NK103(pe)018:124: rnams bgrang ste / par bya'o // sngon du bya
NK103(pe)018:125: ba rdzogs pa de nas mtshon bya'i don rnams gsal
NK103(pe)018:126: rnams bgrang ste / par bya'o // bar byed kapa'i
NK103(pe)018:127: // rgyu rin chen khasna lnga las byas pa'i dkyil
NK103(pe)018:128: rnams bgrang ste / par bya'o // bar byed kapa'i
NK103(pe)018:129: // 'khor man+dala la // kha dog gsal kazhing 'od
NK103(pe)018:130: khazer de 'bar bar byas pa la //
NK103(pe)018:131: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyi spyi bor 'khyil pa la //
NK103(pe)018:132: rdo rje bar ma chad pa'i phreng bas rab tu mtshan tu bri ba nis //
NK103(pe)018:133: don mtshon par byed pa'i sgo brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK103(pe)018:134: de yang rnam shes dang thig le gnas pa'i rten
NK103(pe)018:135: gyi snying ga'i rtsa brgyad gnas pa'i tshul du bris
NK103(pe)018:136: la gzhag /'jug pa'i sgo theg pa brgyad mtshon pa'i
NK103(pe)018:137: sgo brgyad rtsibs brgyad la bris te dgod //
NK103(pe)018:138: shes bya don gyi sgo rnam shes tshogs brgyad rtsa brgyad la gnas par bstan te //
NK103(pe)018:139: 'gro ba rigs drug dang mu stegs rtag chad gnyis
NK103(pe)018:140: te brgyad gong ras la bris te zhor la grol
NK103(pe)018:142: 'gro phyin ci log tu ba'i 'phrang gcad la rig pa'i rtsal sbyang ba dngos ni //
NK103(pe)018:143: bla ma'i mtshan nyid bcu bzhi gong du bstan pa de nyid kyi //
NK103(pe)018:144: yon tan dang ldan pas tshad mar sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su rab tu bzung la //
NK103(pe)018:145: mos pa yis dmigs pa rtse gcig tu ting nge
NK103(pe)018:146: 'dzin gsal bar shes pa gtad la bsgoms pa'i mngon
NK103(pe)018:147: sum pa drod dang ldan na ma bsgoms pa'i mngon
NK103(pe)018:148: sum gyis brda don sprod par bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:149: drod dang ldan pa min na bsgom pas gzugs ming
NK103(pe)018:150: sems la brtag cing 'du shes bsgyur ba la ma
NK103(pe)018:151: bsgoms pas brda don sprad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:152: de la gabar chod 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni rang gi sems nyid yin te /
NK103(pe)018:153: de ngo ma shes pa dang shes kyang de'i ngang du ma goms pa las //
NK103(pe)018:154: bdud rnam pa bzhi'i tshul du shar ba yin te gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)018:155: nang gi bdud ltar du shar ba ni kun gzhi la nga bdag tu 'dzin pa'i bdud kayin te //
NK103(pe)018:156: nyon nga mongs pa dug lnga longs spyod kyi sku rang rig bde chen du ma rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)018:157: gcod byed yid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas ni //
NK103(pe)018:158: rang kho na smra bas rang gis dris pa'i lan rang gis 'debs par byed pa /
NK103(pe)018:159: gzung 'dzin kharang grol ba'i rang rig bde ba chen po'i bar du gcod la //
NK103(pe)018:160: phyi'i bdud ltar shar ba ni yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i gyi bdud yin te //
NK103(pe)018:161: gzugs sogs yul lnga snang la rang bzhin med pa sprul pa'i sku ma shar bas //
NK103(pe)018:162: gcod byed yid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas ni //
NK103(pe)018:163: dang po yul du snang ba'i bgrang ba'i bya ba byed cing //
NK103(pe)018:164: rjes su 'jug la tha ma rnam rtog rkun bur 'byung bas //
NK103(pe)018:165: snang ba'i yul la 'dzin pa rang sar grol ba'i bar du gcod pa'o //
NK103(pe)018:166: de ltar phyi nang gi rjes su 'jug cing rang
NK103(pe)018:167: rigs snga ma'i rjes su 'brang ba ni bar gyi
NK103(pe)018:168: bdud ste // yid kyi spros pa nyid spros bral chos skur ma chod pas //
NK103(pe)018:169: sgo lnga phyi nang nyon yid bar rang rigs snga
NK103(pe)018:170: ma gsum gyi phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar
NK103(pe)018:171: // rang bzhin spros bral gnyug ma ma bcos pa'i bar du gcod pa'o //
NK103(pe)018:172: sku gsum du ngo shes la de'i ngang du ma
NK103(pe)018:173: goms pas mi gnas pa ni ldings pa'i bdud yin
NK103(pe)018:174: te // bla ma la brtse gdung dang bral bas dam tshig la mi gnas //
NK103(pe)018:175: lta ba kha la khyer te don spyi'i rnam pa tsam la gnas //
NK103(pe)018:176: bag chags kyi rten kun gzhi la bag chags de zhen pas //
NK103(pe)018:177: 'jig rten las mi 'phags par 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'ching ba'i dra bar gnas pas //
NK103(pe)018:178: gzhi lam gyi nyes pa kun grol ba'i bde ba
NK103(pe)018:179: chen po sangs rgyas pa'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)018:180: ro // bdud bzhi po de dag rang sar grol bar bya ba'i thabs la yang //
NK103(pe)018:181: phyi nang bar gsum gyi bdud gsum ni shes pa
NK103(pe)018:182: rgod pa zhes pa zhes drang skye ba'i lugs gsum
NK103(pe)018:183: po yin la1 // de 1yi gnas lugs sgyu ma
NK103(pe)018:184: spros bral rang rig lhun grub gsum yin pas de
NK103(pe)018:186: thug phrad du ston pa'i thabs gsum la don nges
NK103(pe)018:187: bar thag bcad pa la blo bzhag thabs ni rtogs
NK103(pe)018:188: pa'i so ma shor ba la re dogs med pas
NK103(pe)018:189: lhug pa skyon la bshes gnyen mi brten pas rang
NK103(pe)018:191: de rtogs goms yis bdud bzhi po de nyid lhun
NK103(pe)018:192: grub gsum po der grol bar 'gyur ba ni dper
NK103(pe)018:193: na chu nyid 'khyag par snang bas dang 'khyag pa
NK103(pe)018:194: chu ru grol ji bzhin du rtogs goms de'i ngang
NK103(pe)018:195: la nan tan gyis gnas pa ni shin tu gces
NK103(pe)018:196: pa'i phyir // de nyid dus rgyun du bsgom pa'i thabs yang gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)018:197: dgon 1pa ru ri khrod du grong yul 3du //
NK103(pe)018:198: rgyal 1po ltar smyon 2pa ltar sprang po 3ltar /
NK103(pe)018:200: lus dang rdzas rten pa gnas kyi dgon pa grong las rgyang grangs su gyur pa ru //
NK103(pe)018:201: rang rig pa byang chub sems kyi don rtogs pa'i dgon pa bskyang //
NK103(pe)018:202: sems lus la rten cing 'brel bas rang gi lus las dgon par 'char ro //
NK103(pe)018:203: dngos su snang ba bzhugs pa'i yul gyi ri khrod du //
NK103(pe)018:204: rig pa sems kyi ri khrod sbyang //
NK103(pe)018:205: rten 'brel gzugs kyi phung po nyid ri khrod du 'char ro //
NK103(pe)018:206: lus dang sems ri khrod dang dgon par ldom bu bya //
NK103(pe)018:207: sems kyis de yi ro snyoms shing ri khrod du ldom bu bya //
NK103(pe)018:208: de yang mnyam na theg pa chen pos 'gro ba'i don du grong yul du ldom bu bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:209: de'i don yang bla ma dam pa ku ku r+aa
NK103(pe)018:210: tsas bskul ba'i cha rkyen du bzhag pa'i tshig ni
NK103(pe)018:211: // rgyu rkyen med par rang rig pa thams cad
NK103(pe)018:212: du gsal lta 'khor 'das mnyam nyid ngang la phyogs
NK103(pe)018:213: ris med pas blta bya lta byed med par ltos
NK103(pe)018:214: // // don ma sgom nor ba'i ngang la gnas
NK103(pe)018:215: pas bcos su med de yin don rang rtogs pa'i
NK103(pe)018:216: // // sor zhog / don la gnas pa'i lus
NK103(pe)018:217: ngag yid kyi sgo gsum spyod ma bcings par bag
NK103(pe)018:219: bu rgyan phyogs ris las grol te mdzes pas dang
NK103(pe)018:220: bcas pa'i ngang la kun rten pas lus tshig rjes
NK103(pe)018:221: ma gcod par lhun gnas kyi don la la rton
NK103(pe)018:222: // // sor zhog / yangs su spyod // ces
NK103(pe)018:223: gsungs so // mtha' 'khor pa yi ban d+he bee
NK103(pe)018:224: ro tsa nas 'og gi 'dir ltar du rig pa'am
NK103(pe)018:225: // // sor zhog / yangs su spyod // ces
NK103(pe)018:226: gsungs so // slob bu bskyang // theg pa'i bye
NK103(pe)018:227: brag ma 'dres par shan kha phye ste ma spangs
NK103(pe)018:228: par mnyam nyid du la bzlas blo sbram gyi rgyud
NK103(pe)018:229: // // sor zhog / yangs su spyod // ces
NK103(pe)018:230: gsungs so // slob bu bskyang // khrol la //
NK103(pe)018:231: dgongs pa rig pa snyan khung du brgyud pa'i gdams
NK103(pe)018:232: pas chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du
NK103(pe)018:233: // // sor zhog / yangs su spyod // ces
NK103(pe)018:234: gsungs so // slob bu bskyang // khrol la //
NK103(pe)018:235: ston // gnas dben par rang gi sems nyid rtogs
NK103(pe)018:236: pa'i ngang du goms par gyis //
NK103(pe)018:237: rang gi rgyud dam gdul bya smin par gyis shig ces gdams so //
NK103(pe)018:238: kye bod pa ste gdams pa bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)018:239: thugs kyi sras bee ro tsa na /
NK103(pe)018:240: dus dang po bla ma gadam pa yon tan dang ldan pa btsal te //
NK103(pe)018:241: de rnyed nas sgo gsum gyis dka' bas bla ma de bsten cing //
NK103(pe)018:242: ci mnyes pas de'i thugs gzung la gdams ngag zhu //
NK103(pe)018:243: rang gi rtsol bas dar drag tu the tshom med par gcad //
NK103(pe)018:244: gtad rgya thams cad yongs su rdzogs par thob nas dben pa'i gnas su rig pa bskyangs //
NK103(pe)018:245: de yang rab lo gsum blo 'bring gis lo bzhi blo dang brtson pa tha mas lo lnga //
NK103(pe)018:246: 'jig rten pa'i g.yengs 'brel rnams kyi thag bcad la rang gi sems goms par bya'o //
NK103(pe)018:247: rang brtan pa thob pa de nas ci bde bar 'gro don mdzad pa de yang don la //
NK103(pe)018:248: bya ba dang byed pa med par rig pa yi //
NK103(pe)018:249: skyes bus bya ba tsal gyi spyod pa ci mdzad kyang bya ba med pa nyid yin te //
NK103(pe)018:250: de yang rtogs goms kyi ngang la ma g.yos par gnas pa'i gdeng chen dang ldan no //
NK103(pe)018:251: rang bzhin gyis lhun gyis grub pa'i rtsol med bde chen gyi ngang du ye nas gnas kyang //
NK103(pe)018:252: de nyid ma rtogs shing phyin ci log tu brtags te 'khrul pas sdug bsngal ba de la //
NK103(pe)018:253: rang grol ba'i man ngag mngon sum du bstan kyang
NK103(pe)018:254: de'i ngang du goms pa dang bral na rang grol
NK103(pe)018:256: de nyid rang rang gi rgyud la 'char bar byed
NK103(pe)018:257: pa'i thabs kyi rim pa'i phreng bar 'gro ba kun
NK103(pe)018:258: gyi rgyud la gnas par smon no //
NK103(pe)018:259: rin po che phreng ba zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)018:260: slob dpon chen po sh+r+ai seng has mdzad pa rdzogs so////
NK103(pe)018:261: se'i ban d+he 'byung ldan gyis gzhan la brtse ba'i sems kyis mchan bu btab pa'o //
